text: On August 31, 2019, multiple people were shot from a vehicle traveling between and in the Texas cities of Odessa and Midland. Odessa police announced five deaths (including the shooter) and 21 injuries (including three police), and described the shooter as a white male in his mid-30s, shot and killed by police outside a movie theater as he fired at them again. ==References== Category:2019 murders in the United States Category:2010s crimes in Texas Category:2019 mass shootings in the United States Category:Attacks on buildings and structures in the United States Category:August 2019 events Category:Mass murder in 2019 Category:Mass murder in Texas Category:Mass shootings in Texas Category:Murders by firearm in Texas Category:2019 in Texas
